title: Holistic Data Collection
headline: Kubar Protocol helps organize all your business details, even handwritten notes, to understand your finances better
content: Ingests structured data from transactions, financial records, and formal documents
Captures unstructured inputs including handwritten notes and informal business documents
Transforms fragmented raw inputs into standardised quantitative insights

title: Embedded Integrations
headline: Kubar Protocol Connects With Your Existing Business Systems So You Can Find The Right Loan At The Right Time, Without Extra Effort
content: Seamlessly integrates within MSME platforms and business management systems
Eliminates traditional borrower acquisition costs and friction
Creates borrower sourcing channels directly at point of business operations

title: Agentic Direct Selling Agent
headline: Kubar Protocol uses smart tools to get a complete picture of your business's strength for loan decisions
content: Applies NLP contextualisation layer to quantitative data
Blends quantitative rigor with qualitative depth

title: Sector-Specific Intelligence
headline: Your business isn't like every other. We show lenders how your industry works so you get loans that actually fit your needs
content: Replaces one-size-fits-all lending with industry-tailored assessment models
Incorporates specialized parameters for diverse sectors (textile vs. ball bearing manufacturing)
Analyses sector-specific cash flow patterns, supply chain dynamics, and growth metrics

title: Workflow Automation
headline: Kubar Protocol uses technology to manage your loan smoothly, from agreement to automatic payments and even alerts for any issues
content: Digitises and executes agreements via DLT-powered smart contracts
Streamlines fund movements through e-NACH mandates and UPl auto-debit
Monitors asset performance with Account Aggregator integrations
